<html>
<head>
<title>{$lang->arcade} - {$game['name']}</title>
<style type='text/css'>
html {
	height: 100%;
	overflow: hidden; /* Hides scrollbar in IE */
}

body {
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
}

#flashcontent {
	height: 100%;
}
</style>
</head>
<body>
	<object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0" id="flashcontent" width="100%" height="100%">
		<param name="movie" value="./arcade/swf/{$game['file']}.swf?ibpro_gameid={$game['gid']}" />
		<param name="wmode" value="direct">
		<param name="quality" value="high" />
		<param name="menu" value="false" />
		<embed src="./arcade/swf/{$game['file']}.swf?ibpro_gameid={$game['gid']}" wmode="direct" width="100%" height="100%" quality="high" menu="false" scrollbars="yes" resizable="yes" swliveconnect="true" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" pluginspage="http://www.macromedia.com/shockwave/download/index.cgi?P1_Prod_Version=ShockwaveFlash" menu="false"></embed>
		<noembed>{$lang->flash_not_installed}</noembed>
	</object>
</body>
</html>
